```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("NIH P1 Emotion Understanding SDS300.xlsx")

data <- janitor::clean_names(data, 'snake')
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = word_span, color = gender)) +
  geom_histogram()

#word span distribution for males
ggplot(data %>% filter(gender == 'M'), aes(x = word_span, color = gender)) +
  geom_histogram()

#word span distribution for females
ggplot(data %>% filter(gender == 'F'), aes(x = word_span, color = gender)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
